entries.text: #0Talk-2rd time, after resting at a Bonfire
(No caption) What if I was there? Well...but I'm not sure...
#0Talk-After talking with Petrus and exhausting his dialogue
(No caption) There will has a way home? Well what's happend?
(No caption) You will come with us fool? But I'll move...
##(No caption) If I still can get myself home?
##(No caption) Now will you think anyway one knew you?
##(No caption) It's advised that move home...
